name: .WM File Extension
summary: Learn about .WM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Windows Media audio or video file; may contain audio, video, or both types of data; formatted using the Windows Media Player codec.

content: The WM extension is a simplified file extension that can be either a .WMA (Windows Audio) or .WMV (Windows Video) file. The WMA and WMV files are more specific and are used more commonly than the WM extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
